p: All readings were obtained in triplicates. MINITAB 17 and SPSS 20 statistical packages were used to analyze the data and generate descriptive statistics of the tested samples. A one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) was used to compare means, which were ranked using Fisherâ€™s Least Significant Difference (LSD) pairwise comparison. Ranked means were considered significantly different at p < 0.05.
